records.name: BatchExecuteErrorDetail
records.description: Represents the properties belonging to an `sql:BatchExecuteError`.

fields.name: maxOpenConnections
fields.description:
The maximum number of open connections that the pool is allowed to have including
both idle and in-use connections. The default value is 15. This can be changed through the
configuration API with the `ballerina.sql.maxOpenConnections` key

fields.name: maxConnectionLifeTime
fields.description:
The maximum lifetime (in seconds) of a connection in the pool. The default value is 1800
seconds (30 minutes). This can be changed through the configuration API with the
`ballerina.sql.maxConnectionLifeTime` key. A value of 0 indicates an unlimited maximum
lifetime (infinite lifetime)

fields.name: minIdleConnections
fields.description:
The minimum number of idle connections that the pool tries to maintain in it. The default value
is the same as `maxOpenConnections` and it can be changed through the configuration
API with the `ballerina.sql.minIdleConnections` key

records.name: ConnectionPool
records.description:
Represents the properties which are used to configure DB connection pool.
Default values of the fields can be set through the configuration API.

records.name: DatabaseErrorDetail
records.description: Represents the properties belonging to an `sql:DatabaseError`.

fields.name: affectedRowCount
fields.description:
Number of rows affected by the execution of the query. It may be one of the following,  
(1) A number greater than or equal to zero, the count of affected rows after the successful execution of the query  
(2) A value of the `SUCCESS_NO_INFO`, the count of affected rows is unknown after the successful execution of the query  
(3) A value of the `EXECUTION_FAILED`, the query execution failed

fields.name: lastInsertId
fields.description: The ID generated by the database in response to a query execution. This can be `()` in case the database does not support this feature

parameters.name: typeDesc
parameters.description: The `typedesc` of the type to which the result needs to be returned

returnParameters.description: The result in the `typeDesc` type, or an `sql:Error`

methods.name: get
methods.description: Parses returned SQL value to a ballerina value.

classes.description: Represents Array Out Parameter in `sql:ParameterizedCallQuery`.

fields.name: value
fields.description:
Value of the parameter
# Deprecated
This `ArrayValue` class deprecated by introducing the a new `ArrayValueType` type.

fields.name: customResultIterator
fields.description: Any custom result iterator to be used overriding the default behaviour

returnParameters.description: True if the next result is `queryResult`

methods.name: getNextQueryResult
methods.description:
Updates `executionResult` or `queryResult` field with the succeeding result in the result list. This will also close the current
results when called.

returnParameters.description: An `sql:Error` if any error occurred while cleanup

methods.name: close
methods.description: Releases the associated resources such as database connection, results, etc.

returnParameters.description: True if the next result is `queryResult`

otherMethods.name: getNextQueryResult
otherMethods.description:
Updates `executionResult` or `queryResult` field with the succeeding result in the result list. This will also close the current
results when called.

returnParameters.description: An `sql:Error` if any error occurred while cleanup

otherMethods.name: close
otherMethods.description: Releases the associated resources such as database connection, results, etc.

parameters.name: sqlQuery
parameters.description: The SQL query

parameters.name: rowType
parameters.description: The `typedesc` of the record to which the result needs to be returned

returnParameters.description: Stream of records in the `rowType` type

methods.name: query
methods.description: Executes the query, which may return multiple results.

parameters.name: sqlQuery
parameters.description: The SQL query

parameters.name: returnType
parameters.description:
The `typedesc` of the record to which the result needs to be returned.
It can be a basic type if the query contains only one column

returnParameters.description: Result in the `returnType` type or an `sql:Error`

methods.name: queryRow
methods.description:
Executes the query, which is expected to return at most one row of the result.
If the query does not return any results, `sql:NoRowsError` is returned

parameters.name: sqlQuery
parameters.description: The SQL query

returnParameters.description: Metadata of the query execution as an `sql:ExecutionResult` or an `sql:Error`

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Executes the SQL query. Only the metadata of the execution is returned (not the results from the query).

parameters.name: sqlQueries
parameters.description: The SQL query with multiple sets of parameters

returnParameters.description: Metadata of the query execution as an `sql:ExecutionResult[]` or an `sql:Error`

methods.name: batchExecute
methods.description:
Executes the SQL query with multiple sets of parameters in a batch. Only the metadata of the execution is returned (not results from the query).
If one of the commands in the batch fails, this will return an `sql:BatchExecuteError`. However, the driver may 
or may not continue to process the remaining commands in the batch after a failure.

parameters.name: sqlQuery
parameters.description: The SQL query

parameters.name: rowTypes
parameters.description: The array `typedesc` of the records to which the results needs to be returned

returnParameters.description: Summary of the execution and results are returned in an `sql:ProcedureCallResult`, or an `sql:Error`

methods.name: call
methods.description: Executes a SQL query, which calls a stored procedure. This can return results or not.

returnParameters.description: Possible error when closing the client

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the SQL client and shuts down the connection pool.

objectTypes.name: CustomResultIterator
objectTypes.description: The iterator for the stream returned in `query` function to be used overriding the default behaviour of sql:ResultIterator.

parameters.name: typeDesc
parameters.description: The `typedesc` of the type to which the result needs to be returned

returnParameters.description: The result in the `typeDesc` type, or an `sql:Error`

methods.name: get
methods.description: Parses returned Char SQL value to a ballerina value.

objectTypes.name: OutParameter
objectTypes.description: Represents the generic OUT Parameters in `sql:ParameterizedCallQuery`.

fields.name: strings
fields.description: The separated parts of the SQL query

fields.name: insertions
fields.description: The values of the parameters that should be filled in between the parts

objectTypes.name: ParameterizedCallQuery
objectTypes.description:
The object constructed through backtick surrounded strings. Dynamic parameters of `sql:Parameter` type can be indicated using `${<variable name>}`.
This validates the parameter types during the query execution.

fields.name: strings
fields.description: The separated parts of the SQL query

fields.name: insertions
fields.description: The values of the parameters that should be filled in between the parts

objectTypes.name: ParameterizedQuery
objectTypes.description:
The object constructed through backtick surrounded strings. Dynamic parameters of `sql:Value` type can be indicated using `${<variable name>}`.
This validates the parameter types during the query execution.

objectTypes.name: TypedValue
objectTypes.description: Generic type that can be passed to `sql:ParameterizedQuery` to represent parameters in the SQL query.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: An array of `sql:Value` values

returnParameters.description: An `sql:ParameterizedQuery`

functions.name: arrayFlattenQuery
functions.description: Joins the parameters in the array with the `,` delimiter into an `sql:ParameterizedQuery`.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Error message used to initialise an `sql:Error`

returnParameters.description: A stream

functions.name: generateApplicationErrorStream
functions.description: Generates a stream consisting of `sql:Error` elements.

returnParameters.description: The connection pool

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Set of `sql:ParameterizedQuery` queries

returnParameters.description: An `sql:ParameterizedQuery`

functions.name: queryConcat
functions.description: Concatenates all provided `sql:ParameterizedQuery`s into a single `sql:ParameterizedQuery`.

constants.name: EXECUTION_FAILED
constants.description: Constant indicating that the specific batch statement failed.

constants.name: SUCCESS_NO_INFO
constants.description:
Constant indicating that the specific batch statement executed successfully
but that the count of affected rows is unavailable.

errors.name: ApplicationError
errors.description: Represents an error originating from application-level configurations.

errors.name: BatchExecuteError
errors.description: Represents an error occurred during execution of batch queries.

errors.name: ConversionError
errors.description: Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves a result that is corrupted and cannot be converted to the expected type.

errors.name: DatabaseError
errors.description:
Represents an error caused by an issue related to database accessibility, erroneous queries, constraint violations,
database resource clean-up, and other similar scenarios.

errors.name: DataError
errors.description: Represents an error during the processing of the parameters or returned results.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Defines the generic error type for the `sql` module.

errors.name: FieldMismatchError
errors.description: Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves a result that cannot be casted to the expected record type.

errors.name: NoRowsError
errors.description: Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves no rows when at most one row is expected.

errors.name: TypeMismatchError
errors.description: Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves a result that differs from the supported result type.

errors.name: UnsupportedTypeError
errors.description: Represents an error that occurs when an unsupported parameter type is added to the query.

types.name: Parameter
types.description: Generic type that can be passed to `sql:ParameterizedCallQuery` to indicate procedure/function parameters.

types.name: Value
types.description: Generic type of ballerina basic types that can be passed to `sql:ParameterizedQuery` to represent parameters in the SQL query.

Represents an error caused by an issue related to database accessibility, erroneous queries, constraint violations,
database resource clean-up, and other similar scenarios.
Represents an error during the processing of the parameters or returned results.
Defines the generic error type for the `sql` module.
Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves a result that cannot be casted to the expected record type.
Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves no rows when at most one row is expected.
Represents an error that occurs when a query retrieves a result that differs from the supported result type.
Represents an error that occurs when an unsupported parameter type is added to the query.

types.description: Generic type that can be passed to `sql:ParameterizedCallQuery` to indicate procedure/function parameters.
Generic type of ballerina basic types that can be passed to `sql:ParameterizedQuery` to represent parameters in the SQL query.

objectTypes.description: The iterator for the stream returned in `query` function to be used overriding the default behaviour of sql:ResultIterator.
Represents the generic OUT Parameters in `sql:ParameterizedCallQuery`.

The object constructed through backtick surrounded strings. Dynamic parameters of `sql:Parameter` type can be indicated using `${<variable name>}`.
This validates the parameter types during the query execution.

The object constructed through backtick surrounded strings. Dynamic parameters of `sql:Value` type can be indicated using `${<variable name>}`.
This validates the parameter types during the query execution.
Generic type that can be passed to `sql:ParameterizedQuery` to represent parameters in the SQL query.
